files.template:
import express from 'express';
export function createTreeRoute(){ const app = express(); app.use(express.json()); app.get('/api/tree', (_req, res)=> res.json([{ id: 'root', label: 'Root' }])); app.post('/api/tree', (req, res)=> res.json({ ok: true, received: req.body })); return app; }
